meanings.definition: A medication used to treat high blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed hydralazine to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: She takes hydralazine every day to manage her hypertension.
meanings.sent3: The hydralazine bottle danced on the shelf, promising relief from high blood pressure.
meanings.sent4: Hydralazine is like a gentle breeze that calms the storm of high blood pressure.
meanings.sent5: The vivid blue color of hydralazine pills reminds me to take care of my heart.

meanings.definition: To treat high blood pressure with the medication hydralazine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will hydralazine my hypertension to improve my health.
meanings.sent2: She hydralazines her high blood pressure by following the prescribed dosage.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally hydralazined the cat, thinking it was a pill bottle.
meanings.sent4: Hydralazine your worries away and let your heart beat freely.
meanings.sent5: As she hydralazines, her blood pressure gently eases like a river flowing smoothly.
